AT.name: Story of Seasons
AT.description: Etwas gelangweilt von der Monotonie des Alltags fällt dein Blick auf ein faszinierendes Angebot auf einem Flugblatt: Eichbaumhausen sucht interessierte junge Farmer, um neue Energie in den regionalen Handel zu bringen! Es ist eine Kleinstadt, aber sie verspricht ein Leben voll von lohnender Arbeit und wertvollen neuen Beziehungen. Nachdem du in der Stadt angekommen bist, bringen dir die freundlichen und aufgeschlossenen Stadtbewohner das Leben als Farmer näher und du erlernst jeden Tag neue Fähigkeiten. Du züchtest Pflanzen, pflegst den Tierbestand, expandierst deine Farm, exportierst Getreide in andere Länder und kümmerst dich sogar um Haustiere. All diese aufregenden neuen Erfahrungen stellen alles bisher Dagewesene in den Schatten! Kannst du es als Farmer schaffen, und dieser neuen Stadt, die dich so herzlich in ihre Gemeinschaft aufgenommen hat, etwas zurückgeben? Welche Art von aufregenden und lehrreichen Erlebnissen erwartet dich?

movies.name: Story of Seaons: Trailer zum Verkaufsstart

AU.name: Story of Seasons
AU.description: Feeling a bit bored with the monotony of life, you come across an intriguing offer on a flyer: Oak Tree Town is seeking fresh young faces to become farmers and help to bring new energy to local trade! It’s a small town, but it promises a life filled with rewarding work and valuable new relationships. Arriving at the town, you begin to learn farming life from the kind and welcoming townsfolk, picking up new skills every day. Growing crops, caring for livestock, developing your farm, shipping crops to other countries, and even looking after pets all provide exciting new experiences a million miles apart from anything before! Can you make it as a farmer, and give something back to this new town that has warmly welcomed you into its community? What kinds of exciting experiences and fun lessons await?

BG.name: Story of Seasons
BG.description: Feeling a bit bored with the monotony of life, you come across an intriguing offer on a flyer: Oak Tree Town is seeking fresh young faces to become farmers and help to bring new energy to local trade! It’s a small town, but it promises a life filled with rewarding work and valuable new relationships. Arriving at the town, you begin to learn farming life from the kind and welcoming townsfolk, picking up new skills every day. Growing crops, caring for livestock, developing your farm, shipping crops to other countries, and even looking after pets all provide exciting new experiences a million miles apart from anything before! Can you make it as a farmer, and give something back to this new town that has warmly welcomed you into its community? What kinds of exciting experiences and fun lessons await?

BE.name: Story of Seasons
BE.description: Lassé par la monotonie du quotidien, vous tombez sur une publicité pour le moins intrigante : le Village du Chêne recherche de nouvelles recrues pour découvrir la vie de fermier et aider à raviver le commerce local ! C'est un petit village, mais il offre la promesse d'une existence comblée par un travail gratifiant et une vie sociale épanouissante. Dès votre arrivée au village, vous commencez votre apprentissage à la ferme aux côtés d'aimables villageois très accueillants. Chaque jour est l'opportunité d'apprendre de nouvelles compétences telles que cultiver la terre, s'occuper de l'élevage, développer votre ferme, exporter des récoltes à l'étranger et même prendre soin d'animaux de compagnie. Toutes ces activités vous permettent de faire de nouvelles expériences à mille lieues de ce que vous avez connu auparavant ! Est-ce que vous pouvez réussir en tant que fermier au point de pouvoir rendre la pareille aux villageois qui vous ont chaleureusement accueilli dans leur communauté ? Quel genre d'expériences passionnantes et de leçons amusantes peuvent bien vous attendre ?

movies.name: Story of Seaons : bande-annonce de lancement

ES.name: Story of Seasons
ES.description: Cansado de vivir en la misma rutina, recibes un folleto con una oferta intrigante: Villarrobledal está buscando caras nuevas para que trabajen como granjeros y contribuyan al crecimiento de la economía local. Se trata de un pueblo pequeño, pero que promete una vida colmada de trabajos gratificantes, además de nuevas y valiosas relaciones. Desde tu llegada al pueblo, comienzas a experimentar la vida en la granja gracias a los afables y acogedores habitantes del pueblo mientras adquieres nuevas habilidades cada día. Plantar cultivos, criar animales, desarrollar tu granja, exportar artículos a otros países o cuidar de mascotas son algunas de las actividades gracias a las que vivirás nuevas y emocionantes experiencias como nunca antes lo habías hecho. ¿Te las arreglarás en la granja y sabrás corresponder a los habitantes del pueblo que te han acogido afectuosamente en su comunidad? ¿Qué clase de experiencias apasionantes y lecciones divertidas te aguardan?

movies.name: Story of Seaons: Tráiler de lanzamiento

IT.name: Story of Seasons
IT.description: Stanco del tedio e della monotonia della vita di tutti i giorni, ti imbatti in un volantino con un'offerta allettante: il villaggio di Querciallegra è in cerca di giovani aspiranti contadini, desiderosi di portare prosperità all'economia locale! Si tratta di un piccolo villaggio, ma offre la promessa di un lavoro appagante e di una vita ricca di rapporti umani di valore. Giunto al villaggio e supportato dall'amichevole popolazione locale, cominci a imparare i segreti della vita di campagna. Coltivare i campi, prenderti cura degli animali, apportare migliorie alla fattoria, spedire i raccolti in Paesi stranieri, godere della compagnia di animali domestici... Tutte esperienze così diverse da ciò che hai provato in passato! Riuscirai ad avere successo come un giovane contadino e a ricambiare la gentilezza degli abitanti del paese che ti hanno dato un così caloroso benvenuto? Quali divertenti ed elettrizzanti esperienze ti attendono?

movies.name: Story of Seaons: trailer di lancio

NL.name: Story of Seasons
NL.description: Enigszins verveeld door de eentonigheid van het leven, kom je een interessant aanbod tegen in een folder: Oak Tree Town zoekt gloednieuw volk om als boeren en boerinnen aan de slag te gaan en zo te helpen de lokale handel nieuwe energie te geven. Het is een klein stadje, maar het belooft een nieuw leven gevuld met bevredigend werk en waardevolle nieuwe relaties. Eenmaal aangekomen in het stadje, leer je over het boerenleven van de gastvrije en vriendelijke inwoners, waarbij je iedere dag meer vaardigheden oppikt. Gewassen verbouwen, vee verzorgen, een boerderij ontwikkelen, gewassen naar andere landen verschepen en zelfs het verzorgen van huisdieren behoren tot de geweldige ervaringen die heel anders zijn dan alles wat ervoor kwam! Lukt het je om te slagen als boer, en iets terug te geven aan dit nieuwe stadje en de gemeenschap die je zo'n warm welkom gegeven heeft? Welke spannende ervaringen en leuke lessen wachten er op jou?

NZ.name: Story of Seasons
NZ.description: Feeling a bit bored with the monotony of life, you come across an intriguing offer on a flyer: Oak Tree Town is seeking fresh young faces to become farmers and help to bring new energy to local trade! PT.name: Story of Seasons
PT.description: Aborrecido com a monotonia da tua vida, encontras um panfleto com uma oferta intrigante: A Oak Tree Town está em busca de caras novas para se tornarem agricultores que ajudem a revitalizar a comunidade local. É uma cidade pequena, mas promete uma vida repleta de trabalho gratificante e amizades duradouras. Quando chegas à cidade, começas a aprender a vida de agricultor com as pessoas da terra, que te recebem calorosamente enquanto adquires novas habilidades todos os dias. Cultivar os campos, cuidar do gado, desenvolver a tua quinta, exportar os teus produtos para outros países e até cuidar de animais de estimação, são todas novas experiências bem diferentes de tudo o que conhecias. Conseguirás vir a ser um agricultor a sério e retribuir a generosidade da comunidade que te ajudou a crescer? Que excitantes experiências e divertidas lições te esperam?

movies.name: Story of Seaons: Trailer de lançamento

RU.name: Story of Seasons
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. Чувствуя себя угнетенным от монотонности повседневной жизни, вы наталкиваетесь на интригующее объявление в форме флаера: Городок Oak Tree Town ищет молодых, трудолюбивых фермеров, которые помогут вдохнуть новую жизнь в местную торговлю. Это маленький городок, но он может предоставить шанс на новую жизнь, насыщенную поощрительной работой и новыми, ценными отношениями. Прибыв в городок, вы приступаете к изучению азов фермерской жизни, в чем вам помогают приветливые и добрые горожане. Каждый день вы будете учиться чему-то новому. Выращивание зерновых культур, ухаживание за скотом, улучшение фермы, отправка товаров в другие страны и даже присмотр за домашними любимцами — все это приносит новый, захватывающий опыт, о котором вам даже мечтать не приходилось! Под силу ли вам фермерская жизнь? Сможете ли вы, только выучив основы нового ремесла, отплатить честным трудом жителям всего городка, которые с такой бескорыстностью приняли вас в свое сообщество? Какие еще веселые жизненные уроки и новые навыки ждут вас?

It’s a small town, but it promises a life filled with rewarding work and valuable new relationships. Arriving at the town, you begin to learn farming life from the kind and welcoming townsfolk, picking up new skills every day. Growing crops, caring for livestock, developing your farm, shipping crops to other countries, and even looking after pets all provide exciting new experiences a million miles apart from anything before! Can you make it as a farmer, and give something back to this new town that has warmly welcomed you into its community? What kinds of exciting experiences and fun lessons await?

ZA.name: Story of Seasons
ZA.description: Feeling a bit bored with the monotony of life, you come across an intriguing offer on a flyer: Oak Tree Town is seeking fresh young faces to become farmers and help to bring new energy to local trade! It’s a small town, but it promises a life filled with rewarding work and valuable new relationships. Arriving at the town, you begin to learn farming life from the kind and welcoming townsfolk, picking up new skills every day. Growing crops, caring for livestock, developing your farm, shipping crops to other countries, and even looking after pets all provide exciting new experiences a million miles apart from anything before! Can you make it as a farmer, and give something back to this new town that has warmly welcomed you into its community? What kinds of exciting experiences and fun lessons await?
